product_name: PATC Hikes in Western Maryland - 3rd Edition
long_description: Hikes in Western Marylandprovides an easy-to-pack trail guide to hiking Maryland's most beautiful trails. Thanks to detailed descriptions and helpful hints, it's easy to plan your day trip.
short_description: Hikes in Western Marylandprovides an easy-to-pack trail guide to hiking Maryland's most beautiful trails. Thanks to detailed descriptions and helpful hints, it's easy to plan your day trip.
